directions: In a shallow baking dish, mix the white wine vinegar, Dijon mustard, lemon juice, Italian seasoning, rosemary, tarragon, capers, and sun-dried tomatoes. Place the salmon fillets into the dish, and turn to coat with the marinade. Season with pepper, and sprinkle with olives. Cover, and refrigerate 1 hour.
Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C).
Bake uncovered for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until fish is easily flaked with a fork.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and sliced
freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Salmon with Dijon Vinaigrette
